scripts.test: mocha -R spec -u bdd --recursive test/unit/  --report lcovonly -- test/unit/ -R spec --recursive
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -x '**/test/**' --report lcovonly -- test/unit/ -R spec --recursive && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
